direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the rendering of changes to the API, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods process and render lists of API endpoints, but with different contexts (new, missing, deprecated).
Both methods handle IO operations and manage exceptions in a similar manner.
Both methods access and manipulate API response data, though for different purposes.
Both methods depend on the ChangedContent object to render content differences.
Both methods involve processing and rendering status-related information, though in different contexts.
